1:
I will sing of covenant faithfulness and justice;\q to you, Yahweh, I will sing praises.


\q
2:
I will walk in the way of integrity.\q Oh, when will you come to me?
\q I will walk with integrity within my house.
\q
4:
Perverse people will leave me;\q I am not loyal to evil.
\q
5:
I will destroy whoever secretly slanders his neighbor.\q I will not tolerate anyone who has a proud demeanor and an arrogant attitude.
\q
6:
I will look to the faithful of the land to sit at my side.\q Those who walk in the way of integrity may serve me.


\q
7:
Deceitful people will not remain within my house;\q liars will not be welcome before my eyes.
\q
8: Morning by morning I will destroy all the wicked from the land;\q I will remove all evildoers from the city of Yahweh.
